articles.author: Patrick Hipes
articles.title: ‘Sinners’, ‘One Battle After Another’, ‘Hamnet’, ‘Marty Supreme’ Among WGA Awards Film Nominees; ‘Pluribus’ Tops TV - Deadline
articles.description: The Writers Guild of America has revealed the nominees for the 2026 WGA Awards honoring the year's best writing across movies, TV, new media and more.
articles.content:
The screenplays from Oscar contenders Sinners, One Battle After Another, Hamnet and Marty Supreme are among the movie nominees revealed Tuesday for the 2026 Writers Guild Awards.
On the TV side, App… [+17272 chars]
